item.title: US-24 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-24 east. Distance to Minturn, Red Cliff, and Leadville. This is the first distance marker eastbound on US-24.

item.title: I-70 East Exit 171 Offramp at US-24/US-6
item.description: I-70 East Exit 171 offramp at US-24/US-6. Turn right for US-24 East to Leadville and Minturn. Turn left for US-6 West.

item.title: CO-82 East - Basalt
item.description: Entering Basalt on CO-82 east. Basalt is a town in the Roaring Fork Valley, located where the Frying Pan River meets the Roaring Fork.
